title: Dutton Campus
cleaned_text: Santa Rosa, CA [Location | Contact | Hours](#dutton-location-details) At our Dutton Campus, you'll have access to outstanding medical, dental, and mental health care, a pharmacy, lab testing, and even complimentary medicine like acupuncture—all under one roof. The Dutton Campus is located on N. Dutton Ave, between College Ave and Guerneville Ave. Look for the orange stripe around the building.
